languages.text: {n}Толпа взрывается ободренными криками. Те, кто мгновение назад готов был смиренно принять смерть, светлеют лицами, стискивают оружие и яростно ревут боевые кличи в лицо мрачной судьбе.{/n}

{n}The crowd erupts into emboldened shouts. Those who were ready to accept death with humble resignation a moment ago now look up with brightened expressions, gripping their weapons and roaring battle cries in the face of a grim fate.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Толпа взрывается ободренными криками. Те, кто мгновение назад готов был смиренно принять смерть, светлеют лицами, стискивают оружие и яростно ревут боевые кличи в лицо мрачной судьбе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The crowd explodes with emboldened shouts. Those who were ready to accept death with humble resignation a moment ago now look up with brightened expressions, clutch their weapons, and roar battle cries in the face of a grim fate.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}群衆から歓声が沸き起こる。さっきまで謙虚に死を受け入れようとしていた者たちが、今は明るい表情で顔を上げ、武器を握りしめ、厳しい運命を前にかちどきの声を上げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd erupts into emboldened shouts. Those who were ready to accept death with humble resignation a moment ago now look up with brightened expressions, gripping their weapons and roaring battle cries in the face of a grim fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}群衆から歓声が沸き起こる。さっきまで謙虚に死を受け入れようとしていた者たちが、今は明るい表情で顔を上げ、武器を握りしめ、厳しい運命を前にかちどきの声を上げる。{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}人群中爆发出了无畏的怒吼声。刚刚还在准备无奈地接受死亡的人们，现在已经抬起了头，充满了决心。他们紧握武器，高声怒吼着，准备迎接接下来的战斗与残酷的命运。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd erupts into emboldened shouts. Those who were ready to accept death with humble resignation a moment ago now look up with brightened expressions, gripping their weapons and roaring battle cries in the face of a grim fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}人群中爆发出了无畏的怒吼声。刚刚还在准备无奈地接受死亡的人们，现在已经抬起了头，充满了决心。他们紧握着武器，高声怒吼着，准备迎接接下来的战斗与残酷的命运。{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}La multitud estalla con gritos fervorosos. Los que hace un momento estaban dispuestos a aceptar la muerte con humilde resignación, ahora levantan la vista con expresiones iluminadas, sujetan con fuerza sus armas y lanzan gritos de guerra ante un destino sombrío.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd erupts into emboldened shouts. Those who were ready to accept death with humble resignation a moment ago now look up with brightened expressions, gripping their weapons and roaring battle cries in the face of a grim fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La multitud estalla con gritos fervorosos. Los que hace un momento estaban dispuestos a aceptar la muerte con humilde resignación, ahora levantan la vista con expresiones iluminadas, empuñan sus armas y lanzan gritos de guerra ante un destino sombrío.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Die Menge bricht in zuversichtliches Geschrei aus. Jene, die eben noch bereit waren, mit demütiger Resignation den Tod anzunehmen, blicken nun lachend nach vorn, die Waffen fest im Griff, und brüllen ihrem düsteren Schicksal wildes Kampfgeschrei entgegen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd erupts into emboldened shouts. Those who were ready to accept death with humble resignation a moment ago now look up with brightened expressions, gripping their weapons and roaring battle cries in the face of a grim fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Menge bricht in zuversichtliches Geschrei aus. Jene, die eben noch bereit waren, mit demütiger Resignation den Tod anzunehmen, blicken nun lachend nach vorn, die Waffen fest im Griff, und brüllen ihrem düsteren Schicksal wildes Kampfgeschrei entgegen.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Le foule explose de dizaines de hurlements fervents. Ceux qui, il y a quelques secondes encore, s'étaient résignés à mourir de votre main, vous regardent désormais avec détermination et empoignent leurs armes en criant pour affronter leur destin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd erupts into emboldened shouts. Those who were ready to accept death with humble resignation a moment ago now look up with brightened expressions, gripping their weapons and roaring battle cries in the face of a grim fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le foule explose de dizaines de hurlements fervents. Ceux qui, il y a quelques secondes encore, s'étaient résignés à mourir de votre main, vous regardent désormais avec détermination et lèvent leurs armes en signe d'encouragement.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison

languages.text: {n}Kalabalık, gaza gelip haykırmaya başlıyor. Daha demin kaderine teslim olmaya hazır olanlar; yüzlerinde aydınlık ifadelerle başlarını dik tutuyor, silahlarını sıkıca kavrayıp acı kaderlerine karşı savaş nidaları atıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The crowd erupts into emboldened shouts. Those who were ready to accept death with humble resignation a moment ago now look up with brightened expressions, gripping their weapons and roaring battle cries in the face of a grim fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kalabalık, gaza gelip haykırmaya başlıyor. Daha demin kaderine teslim olmaya hazır olanlar, yüzlerinde aydınlık ifadelerle başlarını dik tutuyor; silahlarını sıkıca kavrayıp acı kaderlerine karşı savaş nidaları atıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ImperialSoldier_Ranged_Prison
